title: verify inline policy if ccl score is low and app_tag is predefined/custom
custom_summary: verify inline policy if ccl score is low and app_tag is predefined/custom
custom_steps:
steps:
1.login to webui
2.Go to Policies->Real time Protection
3.Click New Policy -> cloud/web app Access
4.create block inline policy with CCL poor and app_tag is either predefined/customtag
custom_expected:
1.File upload/download should be blocked in block
2.The action generates an Block
3.The object type is file and activity should be upload/Download
5.The alert and skopeIT event should contain proper object , object_id , device , OS , browser , From user , Alert type
, alert , action generated , alert name , policy name
